resources.string: The movie list can not be loaded

string-array.name: on_boarding_texts
string-array.item: This application has created movie lists and details using the API of The Movie Database site. For more detailed information, you can visit The Movie Database web site.
The interface of the application has been updated accordingly in order to enable users to follow the movies.

You can follow the most rated, popular and trendy movies that will be published in the cinema. You can follow the movies in these categories from the menu section of the movies in your favorite categories. The trailers will be watched through the movies you have chosen.

resources.string: Did you like the application? Rate the application on Google Play Store
There is no internet connection.Check the internet connection.
